title: 如何改变玩家的模式
author: TheGuantou
txt_content:
本帖最后由 TheGuantou 于 2015-3-15 14:36 编辑 

如题，表示找了几遍docs都没找到

replies.author: jiongjionger
replies.txt_content:
例子，将玩家修改为创造模式
e.getPlayer().setGameMode(GameMode.CREATIVE);

replies.author: Hineven
replies.txt_content:
a451993547 发表于 2015-3-13 03:22
插件的话是
Player.getItemInHand().getTypeId()
答非所问。。。。。
